snp5.17:1124: Ajito tissametteyyo,puṇṇako atha mettagū;Dhotako upasīvo ca,nando ca atha hemako.
snp5.17:1125: Todeyya-kappā dubhayo,jatukaṇṇī ca paṇḍito;Bhadrāvudho udayo ca,posālo cāpi brāhmaṇo;Mogharājā ca medhāvī,piṅgiyo ca mahāisi.
snp5.17:1126: Ete buddhaṁ upāgacchuṁ,sampannacaraṇaṁ isiṁ;Pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe,buddhaseṭṭhaṁ upāgamuṁ.
snp5.17:1127: Tesaṁ buddho pabyākāsi,pañhe puṭṭho yathātathaṁ;Pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena,tosesi brāhmaṇe muni.
snp5.17:1129: Ekamekassa pañhassa,yathā buddhena desitaṁ;Tathā yo paṭipajjeyya,gacche pāraṁ apārato.
snp5.17:1130: Apārā pāraṁ gaccheyya,bhāvento maggamuttamaṁ;Maggo so pāraṁ gamanāya,tasmā pārāyanaṁ iti.
snp5.17:1131: "Pārāyanamanugāyissaṁ,Yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsi;Vimalo bhūrimedhaso,Nikkāmo nibbano nāgo;Kissa hetu musā bhaṇe.
snp5.17:1133: Tamonudo buddho samantacakkhu,Lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto;Anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno,Saccavhayo brahme upāsito me.
snp5.17:1134: Dijo yathā kubbanakaṁ pahāya,Bahupphalaṁ kānanamāvaseyya;Evampahaṁ appadasse pahāya,Mahodadhiṁ haṁsoriva ajjhapatto.
snp5.17:1135: Ye me pubbe viyākaṁsu,Huraṁ gotamasāsanā;Iccāsi iti bhavissati,Sabbaṁ taṁ itihītihaṁ;Sabbaṁ taṁ takkavaḍḍhanaṁ.
snp5.17:1136: Eko tamanudāsino,jutimā so pabhaṅkaro;Gotamo bhūripaññāṇo,gotamo bhūrimedhaso.
snp5.17:1138: "Kiṁ nu tamhā vippavasasi,muhuttamapi piṅgiya;Gotamā bhūripaññāṇā,gotamā bhūrimedhasā.
snp5.17:1142: Passāmi naṁ manasā cakkhunāva,Rattindivaṁ brāhmaṇa appamatto;Namassamāno vivasemi rattiṁ,Teneva maññāmi avippavāsaṁ.
snp5.17:1143: Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,Nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā;Yaṁ yaṁ disaṁ vajati bhūripañño,Sa tena teneva natohamasmi.
snp5.17:1144: Jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassa,Teneva kāyo na paleti tattha;Saṅkappayantāya vajāmi niccaṁ,Mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto.
snp5.17:1145: Paṅke sayāno pariphandamāno,Dīpā dīpaṁ upaplaviṁ;Athaddasāsiṁ sambuddhaṁ,Oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṁ".
snp5.17:1146: "Yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho,Bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo ca;Evamevaṁ tvampi pamuñcassu saddhaṁ,Gamissasi tvaṁ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāraṁ".
snp5.17:1147: "Esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi,Sutvāna munino vaco;Vivaṭṭacchado sambuddho,Akhilo paṭibhānavā.
snp5.17:1148: Adhideve abhiññāya,Sabbaṁ vedi varovaraṁ;Pañhānantakaro satthā,Kaṅkhīnaṁ paṭijānataṁ.
snp5.17:1149: Asaṁhīraṁ asaṅkuppaṁ,Yassa natthi upamā kvaci;Addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā,Evaṁ maṁ dhārehi adhimuttacittan"ti.
